entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 13 except 7 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 13 except 7 along parts of the coast. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 17 April 2023
